import React from "react"; import GenerallBanner from "./assets/banner"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import WeeklyDeals from "./assets/weekly_deals"; class Category extends React.Component { render() { const product = { title: "product title", new_price: "100", old_price: "200", imgUrl: "./assets/img/product/p1.jpg" }; const categories_filter = () => { let categories = [] for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++) { categories.push(
  • Category({i + 1})
      {subcategory(i + 1)}
    • ) } return categories; } const subcategory = (n) => { let subcategories = [] for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) { subcategories.push(
  • Subcategory({n + "," + i})
    • ) } return subcategories; } const brands_filter = () => { let brands = [] for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) { brands.push(
    • ) } return brands; } const color_filter = () => { let colors = [] for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) { colors.push(
    • ) } return colors; } const products_area = () => { let products = [] for (let i = 0; i < 6; i++) { products.push(
    {product.title}
    ${product.new_price}
    ${product.old_price}

    add to bag

    Wishlist

    view more

    ) } return products; } return ( <> {/* */} < div class="container" >
    Browse Categories
      {categories_filter()}
    Product Filters
    Brands

    Color
      {color_filter()}
    Price

    $

    $
    {/* */}
    1 2 3 6

    {/* */}
    1 2 3 6
    {/* */}
    ); } } export default Category;
